item.title: A Fresh Take On Coffee T-Shirts
item.description:
A Fresh Take On Coffee T-Shirts

The coffee shop has always been one of the great incubators for artist-types. It's a home base for creative nomads, where those not shackled to desk jobs go to sketch, write, or just ideate into leather-bound notepads, propped up only by a cup of coffee and, depending on your location and era, a pack of cigarettes.

item.title: Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates
item.description:
Treehouse Chocolate's Four Drinking Chocolates

Winter may be officially over in the Northern Hemisphere, but that doesn't mean hot chocolate has to disappear from people's radar until temperatures cool again. For some of us, it makes for a viable alternative to coffee in the morning-with some serious sugar and cocoa kick.
